title: LAST_INDEX_OF
description: Returns the starting position (zero-based index) of the last occurrence of substring within string. The search is case-sensitive. If end_position_optional is provided, the search considers characters from the start of the string up to the specified end position. Returns -1 if the substring is not found.

parameters.name: end_position_optional
parameters.description: The zero-based index indicating the end position for the search. If omitted, searches the entire string.

examples:
LAST_INDEX_OF("ERR_100|DONE|ERR_200|DONE", "ERR_", 12)
 -- Returns 0. Finds "ERR_" at index 0 within first 12 characters.

LAST_INDEX_OF("Status: Info, status: Warn", "status")
 -- Returns 14. Finds "status" at index 14, case-sensitive.
